title: Dynamic QTE System
description: This pack contains fully customizable QTE(Quick Time Events) system, with example animations and many various settings.
longDescription:
Quick:
  • Demonstration video and tutorial playlist: Youtube link!
  • Playable demo added now: Download link!


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!


About:

With newest update - This system is Dynamic and Cinematic QTE builder.

System was totally redone and upgraded, it provides very advanced features to create complex QTE scenes, now it is possible to build very complex and non-linear QTE scenes with various consequences and conditions.


The QTE system can build any kind of interactive scene, also with usage of various complex cinematics, any actors can play the roles in the interactive scenes, and can lead to different scenes, results are fully editable, it can be based on actions and conditions.


The system is editable and includes complex QTE builder logic, we can fire and play various events and create seamless scenes, system can be used to play interactive scenes even without any actions, so background actors or NPC can use QTE scenes to play dynamic scene, even without usage of player actor or any input.


Does include subsystems from MSL toolkit, for easy QTE usage and input calculations.


Note:

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

technicalDetails:
Features:﻿

  •  Works in single player only, not replicated.
  •  Complex QTE Builder with many features and advanced logic.
  •  Can be used to build seamless interactive scenes, and dynamic cinematics.
  • Easily can fit any project, can be used to create any type of QTE scenes.
  • Many editable features, includes bonus system from MSL toolkit.


Disk Size: 41.2 MB

Number of Blueprints: 1 system actor, and 1 component.

Input: Mouse/Keyboard/Gamepad

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: All/Tested only on Win

Supported Target Build Platforms: All/Tested only on Win


New version is compatible with engine versions: 4.19.2-4.26

About version compatibility: The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Update is V3, system is totally redone, we recommend to use this separately from old version.
